The Social Security Administration (SSA) recently released its 2022 calendar, showing when recipients can expect to receive their benefit payments in the coming year.

articles.title: Jobless claims little changed in potential sign that layoffs have hit a plateau - CNBC
articles.description: First-time claims for unemployment insurance were expected to total 260,000 for the week ended Nov. 13.
